name: Punching Queen
description:
This game was built in 48 hours for the #minibeansjam

Each game of the jam must match two of the three following themes:

  • Magnetic
  • Queen
  • Recycle

Notes for playing in Chrome
Due to a bug in Chrome, you may not immediately hear the music when starting the game.

Punching Queen
It is the year 2101 and humanity is ruled by a wise queen, but one day a catastrophic event happened and she had to save the world by fighting and recycling robots!

Controls
Walk around with WASD and jump with SPACE. In order to fight the robots you can punch them with K or throw your recycled robot arm at them with L. Of course you first have to collect such a robot arm, but luckily you have magnetic armor which will automatically collect and equip a nearby robot arm. 

You may get injured in the fight but don't worry, some robots will probably drop healing parts, which will be collected automatically when you're close enough.

Good luck!

Developed by:
Dima Chotin - Graphics
InfectedBytes- Programming
Vault Kid - Sound
